channel.title: deathmatch classic, how close IS it to quake world anyway?
channel.description: Hello, was thinking of getting deathmatch classic, but im not going to until this question is answered. Quake world (the game deathmatch classic was based from) was really satanic, even when you were playing mods you could see the pentagram in the corner. So i want to ask, Does deathmatch classic have satanism like quake world? if not, where can i get maps and such for the game?

item.title: deathmatch classic, how close IS it to quake world anyway?
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
mattemuse:

in quake live, people gib into faggoty sparkles of gayness. There is no discernible Satanism, but there are powerful homoerotic overtones that could turn even the most devout and dedicated Christian gamer into a flagrant lover of manjuices.

Things make so much sense now

Read full topic

So i want to ask, Does deathmatch classic have satanism like quake world? if not, where can i get maps and such for the game?
